channel.title: Noble Reworks [Rework Suggestion]
channel.description:
Disclaimer: This includes Aristocrat and Apostle, not just Noble.
This is meant to change the Noble as least as possible, to not make dramatic changes overall.
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Noble**[/color]
_Passives_
**Royal Blood:**
_Abilities_
**Political Pressure:** (D) (3) (As is)
**Private Matter:** (D) (2) (Take this away from Mystic and Illusionist)
**Maid Spy:** (D) (oo) (As is)
**Royal Advisor:** (D) (2) Tomorrow, you will see all whispers to and from the King.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**The Aristocrat**[/color]
_Passives_
**Royal Blood:**
_Abilities_
**Political Pressure:** (D) (3) (As is)
**Private Matter:** (D) (2) (Take this away from Mystic and Illusionist)
**Eavesdrop:** (N) (oo) Choose two players. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow. Includes the King.
**Snoop:** (N) (2) (As is)
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=red]**The Apostle**[/color]
(Allow to be Starting Cult Underling)
_Passives_
_Abilities_
**Might of Mithras:** (D) (2) Force a player to accuse another player and prevent further voting from them.
**Telepathy:** (D) (2) (As is)
**Eavesdrop:** (N) (3) Choose two players. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow. Includes the King.
**Mind Warp:** (N) (2) (As is)
[/quote]
As can be seen, this is meant to put an even bigger limit on the Whisper King meta and to remove Snoop from the Noble.

item.title: Noble Reworks [Rework Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
My first guess would be maid spy

It has so many day abilities. And compared to everything else spy isn’t useful

Talking to my self replying to myself
Is new meta

item.title: Noble Reworks [Rework Suggestion]

item.description:
Well without a telepathy a converted mystic won’t be able to confirm also it can cause a lot of chaos and cult already are weak with low conformability

item.description:

Also if you want the devs to do less coding then rename Might Of Mithras back to cult pressure (don’t do this I like the name a lot, I’m just using this as an example)

item.title: Noble Reworks [Rework Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Livicus:

Private Matter: (D) (2)

(Take this away from Mystic and Illusionist)

I like this

Livicus:

Royal Advisor: (D) (2)

Tomorrow, you will see all whispers to and from the King.

This is good but this won’t really affect king’s whisper meta since most of the time noble is BD

Livicus:

Eavesdrop: (N) (oo)

Choose two players. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow. Includes the King.

Okay this one is better but most of the time you won’t see a noble get converted

Livicus:

Might of Mithras: (D) (2)

Force a player to accuse another player and prevent further voting from them.

like this name a lot

Livicus:

Mind Warp: (N) (2)

(As is)

I don’t feel like this fits apostle

Read full topic

item.title: Noble Reworks [Rework Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Disclaimer: This includes Aristocrat and Apostle, not just Noble.

This is meant to change the Noble as least as possible, to not make dramatic changes overall.

The Noble

Passives

Royal Blood:

Abilities

Political Pressure: (D) (3)
(As is)

Private Matter: (D) (2)
(Take this away from Mystic and Illusionist)

Maid Spy: (D) (oo)
(As is)

Royal Advisor: (D) (2)
Tomorrow, you will see all whispers to and from the King.

The Aristocrat

Passives

Royal Blood:

Abilities

Political Pressure: (D) (3)
(As is)

Private Matter: (D) (2)
(Take this away from Mystic and Illusionist)

Eavesdrop: (N) (oo)
Choose two players. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow. Includes the King.

Snoop: (N) (2)
(As is)

The Apostle

(Allow to be Starting Cult Underling)

Passives

Abilities

Might of Mithras: (D) (2)
Force a player to accuse another player and prevent further voting from them.

Telepathy: (D) (2)
(As is)

Eavesdrop: (N) (3)
Choose two players. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow. Includes the King.

Mind Warp: (N) (2)
(As is)

As can be seen, this is meant to put an even bigger limit on the Whisper King meta and to remove Snoop from the Noble.
